data_url.label: Data URL
data_url.help: (Optional) The url to listen to for device data. Default: /reekoh/data

message_url.label: Message URL
message_url.help: (Optional) The url to listen to for device messages or commands. Default: /reekoh/messages

groupmessage_url.label: Group Message URL
groupmessage_url.help: (Optional) The url to listen to for group messages or commands. Default: /reekoh/groupmessages
